response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you, given its worth of $12,000 to you. Considering its unique features and high demand, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price of $11,000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents a substantial saving compared to its market value. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 11000}
